name: JETTAN
description:
Choose between Tank or Jet, and play 1v1 against your friends on multiple maps, in a variety of sizes. When a player has 3 points, the round will end and you will have a winner.

Control your Tank with WASD, and Destroy your enemy by firing with  SPACE.

Lift off by pressing the up arrow key. Once your Jet is in flight, use the left and right arrow keys to steer, and the up arrow key to cruise at twice the speed! Press ENTER fire missiles, and Annihilate your enemy.
